item.title: Cappuccino vs. Latte vs. Macchiato - What's the Difference?
item.description: If youâ€™re exploring the world of milk-based espresso drinks, you may be confused. Almost everyone knows what a Cappuccino is, but what the heck is a Macchiato? and what about a Latte?
